title: TiKV fails to start
body:
## Bug Report

TiKV fails to start with the configuration template in etc:
```
% tikv-server -C test.toml
thread 'main' panicked at 'invalid auto generated configuration file test.toml, err missing field `type` for key `security.encryption.master-key`', /rustc/b2e36e6c2d229126b59e892c9147fbb68115d292/src/libstd/macros.rs:16:9
stack backtrace:
   0: backtrace::backtrace::libunwind::trace
             at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.46/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:86
   1: backtrace::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized
             at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.46/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66
   2: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt
             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:78
   3: <std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::DisplayBacktrace as core::fmt::Display>::fmt
             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:59
   4: core::fmt::write
             at src/libcore/fmt/mod.rs:1069
   5: std::io::Write::write_fmt
             at src/libstd/io/mod.rs:1504
   6: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print
             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:62
   7: std::sys_common::backtrace::print
             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:49
   8: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:198
   9: std::panicking::default_hook
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:218
  10: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:511
  11: rust_begin_unwind
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:419
  12: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:373
  13: tikv::config::TiKvConfig::from_file::{{closure}}
             at /rustc/b2e36e6c2d229126b59e892c9147fbb68115d292/src/libstd/macros.rs:16
  14: core::result::Result<T,E>::unwrap_or_else
             at /rustc/b2e36e6c2d229126b59e892c9147fbb68115d292/src/libcore/result.rs:853
  15: tikv::config::TiKvConfig::from_file
             at /tikv/src/config.rs:2237
  16: tikv_server::main::{{closure}}
             at cmd/src/bin/tikv-server.rs:148
  17: core::option::Option<T>::map_or_else
             at /rustc/b2e36e6c2d229126b59e892c9147fbb68115d292/src/libcore/option.rs:506
  18: tikv_server::main
             at cmd/src/bin/tikv-server.rs:146
  19: std::rt::lang_start::{{closure}}
             at /rustc/b2e36e6c2d229126b59e892c9147fbb68115d292/src/libstd/rt.rs:67
  20: std::rt::lang_start_internal::{{closure}}::{{closure}}
             at src/libstd/rt.rs:52
```

### What version of TiKV are you using?
master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
Don't matter.

### Steps to reproduce
Just start it with the configuration template.

### What did you expect?
TiKV starts or complains missing pd endpoints.

### What did happened?
Panic.
